law.catch_line: Warden to inform prisoners of law on escapes.
law.text: The warden of the penitentiary shall cause each prisoner, when received into the penitentiary, to be informed of the contents of Chapter 520 and KRS 506.010.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 401, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 147, effective July 15, 1980. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1233.
